name: Tales of Dragonfall
description:
Tales of Dragonfall is a roguelike 3D magic shooter. 

In this game, you’ll play as Janus, a draconic sorcerer, whose current goal is to find and free the dragons kidnapped by the Umbral Cabal, a mystical order or shadow sorcerers who are plotting to take over the world. 

Having been transported into a new, fragmented world, Janus must free the dragons trapped in each island, and have them fly him to the next one in search of the Elder Dragon. Along the way, you will fight several elemental infused enemies and grow ever stronger.

What awaits you on the final island? Will you triumph on your journey? Will the world succumb to the dark plots of the Cabal? Only you determine the outcome.

Team Members - Development
